OOC: Hmm... my poor little Firaxis seems to have broken the mystical forth 
wall... something shall have to be done to him... er... about him...

::Firaxis::
       "Well... I'm not really sure what it is.  But it fell on us so it 
seems like it might be worth checking out.  I've been a mercenary too long to 
dismiss coincidences.  Too often they're annoying plot devices... er... 
things that can be useful later."  He shakes his head and looks around seeing 
things in a new light.  "Umm, I'm at the surface waiting for you, so just 
come back up the way we went in and I'll lead you to the artifact.

--part1_6a.249e9648.2a90636a_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
